value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MID-GAME BUNKER "RUSH"! (PartinG vs Cure)
value.excerpt: A really fun series of professional StarCraft 2 between PartinG and Cure. In this best-of-3 we see a variety of openers from both players and in two of them, Cure goes for a timing attack where he's building structures like Bunkers on his opponent's side of the map.  Support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: THE NUKE DREAM! (Viewer Games)
value.excerpt: Three viewer submitted games of StarCraft 2 with some of the best/worst Nukes in games I've seen. This video includes a Platinum League match of Protoss versus Protoss, a Gold League match of 2v2 and a Silver League game of Terran versus Terran.  Submit your own games (please only submit your best) to

value.title: StarCraft 2: THE ULTIMATE TERRAN ARMY? (soO vs Dream)
value.excerpt: Mass Battlecruiser, Siege Tank, Thors and Hellbats. A Terran Deathball in this professional match of StarCraft 2. In this Zerg versus Terran soO decides to play very aggressively against Dream who is trying to make the ultimate Terran army.  Support OlimoLeague: https://www.patreon.com/olimoley Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: uThermal's SUPER SLOW Terran Push!
value.excerpt: Stargazers managed to take fourth place at the most recent StarCraft 2 Map Contest (TLMC 16). There's a good chance that this map will be used in future SC2 tournaments. In this video I cast two pro matches on the new map.  00:00 uThermal vs Rattata 12:33 MaxPax vs Bly  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: WHO CALLED IN THE FLEET? (Dark vs TY)
value.excerpt: Dark versus TY in an epic game of StarCraft 2. In this game of top-level StarCraft we see TY play a different approach than most Terrans do at this level. A lot of Terran players enjoy playing a late-game composition based around the Thor at the moment, but TY decides to focus on a Battlecruiser army
